value.string:
<tal:block replace="nothing"
 xmlns:tal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/tal"
 xmlns:metal="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/metal"
 xmlns:i18n="http://xml.zope.org/namespaces/i18n"/>
 
 <tal:block define="dummy python: request.RESPONSE.setHeader('Content-Type', 'text/css;; charset=utf-8')"/>
 
 /*========================================================================================
 ListBox_asWorkspaceWidgets CSS.
 
 ========================================================================================*/
 
 .workspace_widget_ListContent,
 .no_prending_application_explanation{
 margin-top:1.7em;
 }
 
 .workspace_widget_ListContent li a{
 text-decoration:underline;
 }
 
 .workspace_widget_ListContent li{
 margin: 0 1em 0 1em;
 line-height: 1em;
 padding: 0.3em 0.3em 1.3em 0.3em;
 /*float:left;*/
 /*width:90%;*/
 }
 
 .workspace_widget_ListContent li.DataA{
 background: #FFFFFF;
 }
 
 .workspace_widget_ListContent li.DataB{
 background: #EEEEEE;
 }
 
 .workspace_widget_ListContent li .workspace_widget_translated_portal_type,
 .workspace_widget_ListContent li .workspace_widget_id,
 .workspace_widget_ListContent li .modification_date{
 float: left;
 }
 
 .workspace_widget_ListContent .workspace_widget_translated_validation_state_title,
 .workspace_widget_ListContent .workspace_widget_modification_date{
 float: right;
 }
 
 .workspace_widget_ListContent ul{
 padding: 1em 1em 0 1em;
 list-style-type:none;
 list-style-position:outside;
 }
 
 .workspace_widget_ListContent .modification_date,
 .workspace_widget_ListContent .workspace_widget_modification_date{
 font-style: italic;
 font-size:0.8em;
 }
 
 .workspace_widget_listbox_title{
 background:#DDDDEE;
 border-bottom:1px solid #AAAAAA;
 position:absolute;
 top:0;
 left:0;
 width:100%;
 text-align:center;
 font-weight:bold;
 font-size:1.2em;
 height:1em;
 padding-top:0.2em;
 padding-bottom:0.4em;
 margin-bottom:20px;
 }
 
 .full_listbox{
 margin-right: 1em;
 margin-top: 0.5em;
 margin-bottom: 0.5em;
 float:right; 
 }
